Bash(git -C /media/endlessblink/data/my-projects/ai-development/game-dev/ai-game-production-lecture commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
[FEATURE-012] HISM vegetation scatter with persistence across restarts

- Fix Poisson disk grid pattern: replace grid seeds with random placement
- Add landscape-only trace filter \(ALandscapeProxy check\) to prevent floating
- HISM persistence: RF_Transactional, AddInstanceComponent, BuildTreeIfOutdated,
  PostEditChangeProperty\(PerInstanceSMData\), OFPA external package marking
- Fix AnimBP transition crash: AllocateDefaultPins before CreateConnections
- Fix tree material slots: use material_slot param for per-slot assignment
- Create /vegetation-scatter skill with all 12 passes hardcoded

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /media/endlessblink/data/my-projects/ai-development/game-dev/ai-game-production-lecture commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Snapshot: robot animations, input actions, landscape MIs, scatter skills

New: 8 robot animations \(walk, run, idle, kick, hits, jump\),
5 input actions \(sprint, attacks, kick\), M_Robot_Test_Red,
MI_Landscape_Ground v3-v7, MCPHelperLibrary, grass/rock scatter skills.
Updated: ABP_Robot, BP_RobotCharacter, M_Landscape_Distorted,
plugin commands \(Blueprint, BlueprintGraph, Editor, CommonUtils, Bridge\).
MASTER_PLAN: added TASK-012, TASK-013.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(else echo "Output file not found yet")
